section: This Agreement shall automatically extend for an additional two (2) years on the same terms herein (Renewal Term) provided WPT receives payments greater than twelve million U.S. dollars ($12,000,000) within the Initial Term.
explanation: This clause has ambiguity in text. It is unclear whether the payments of 12 million must be royalties or if the payments can be from any source of funds. Since the earlier terms in the document specified that the annual minimum guarantee comes from royalties it can be assumed the funds should come from royalties, but that is not specified in the document.

section: Royalty. The Royalties to be paid by Zynga to WPT is the percentage of Net Revenue as set forth in Section 5 of the Basic Provisions. Net Revenue(s) shall be defined as one hundred percent (100%) of gross revenues and all other receivables of any kind whatsoever received by Zynga or any of Zyngas affiliates attributable to the use of Paid Currency or in connection with the sale of Virtual Digital Goods derived from use of the WPT-brand on the Zynga platform, less the following actual and verifiable Allowable Deductions: (i) out-of-pocket, third-party payment processing and currency system fees, commissions, and platform distribution fees (e.g., Apple, Google or Facebook platform fees) (ii) any governmental taxes (e.g., VAT, excise or sales or use tax, etc.) arising in connection with related receipts, but excluding any taxes on Licensees net income and (iii) charge- backs/refunds/cancellations/fraud.
explanation: This section has structural flaws in text. The text makes references to sections of the agreement, but it is not structured properly. There are parenthesis in the middle of sentences and it makes it hard to read and hard to interpret. The term 'Net Revenue(s)' is also awkwardly defined.

section: Zynga shall advise WPT to Zyngas knowledge as to which jurisdictions where it may be illegal to advertise Zyngas Licensed Property (if any) given local laws or regulations.
explanation: There is an omission in the text. Zynga is only responsible for telling WPT to Zyngas knowledge, but there is no legal obligation that they should find this information out or be responsible if they do not tell them this information.
